title.rendered: Supply Chain Issues with Steven Pope of My Amazon Guy

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 16:50 — 15.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 16:50 — 15.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Today we complete our interview with Stephen Pope of my Amazon guy, which is an Amazon full-service agency.

They deal with the unsexy stuff like catalog management, PPC as well as supply chain issues.

 

If you have lost shipments, Amazon owes you money, sign up for My Refund Guy for $500 of free clawbacks.

You’ll Learn:

  • The different shipping restrictions issues and solutions to them
  • Why everything is in short supply now
  • How to source locally
  • How to control your own mechanisms
